description: This file provides utility functions for error handling, including extracting user-friendly error messages and parsing validation errors from API responses, specifically tailored to handle FastAPI error structures and Axios errors.

methods.name: extractErrorMessage(err, fallback = "An unexpected error occurred.")
methods.description: Converts various error shapes into a user-friendly string message, handling string errors, Error objects, Axios responses, and FastAPI error structures.

methods.name: parseValidationErrors(err)
methods.description: Parses FastAPI 422 ValidationError responses into structured field-specific errors and non-field errors, translating API validation errors into a more usable format.

ctags.name: extractErrorMessage
ctags.pattern: /^ export function extractErrorMessage(err, fallback = "An unexpected error occurred.") {$/

ctags.name: fieldErrors
ctags.pattern: /^   const result = { fieldErrors: {}, nonFieldErrors: [], status: undefined };$/

ctags.name: nonFieldErrors
ctags.pattern: /^   const result = { fieldErrors: {}, nonFieldErrors: [], status: undefined };$/

ctags.name: result
ctags.pattern: /^   const result = { fieldErrors: {}, nonFieldErrors: [], status: undefined };$/

ctags.name: status
ctags.pattern: /^   const result = { fieldErrors: {}, nonFieldErrors: [], status: undefined };$/

fields.name: const result = { fieldErrors: {}, nonFieldErrors: [], status: undefined };
